name: Montu
title: Montu (Month, Menthu) - Egyptian Mythology
subtitle: God of War and the Bull
shortDescription: Montu is the falcon-headed war god associated with the bull. Once supreme god of Thebes before being supplanted by Amun . God of military victory, martial prowess, and the raging bull's strength. Depicted with bull horns and sun disk. Pharaohs called themselves 'Mighty Bull, Son of Montu' when emphasizing military might.
longDescription: Full detailed mythology and worship information coming soon. For now, see related deities and use the corpus search to explore ancient texts mentioning Montu.
